thread.section_title: Hotel Dei Borgognoni - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, lovely staff
thread.title_full: Great location, lovely staff - Review of Hotel Dei Borgognoni, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: antonia n
title: Great location, lovely staff
text:
The hotel is in a quiet side street yet a mere 5 minutes walk from the Trevi Fountain, 5 minutes to the Spanish steps and approximately 10-15 minutes to all the other main attractions in Rome with the exception of the Vatican which is further away. This hotel was just what we were looking for, elegant but without gym/spa etc which would have pushed the price up. However, it is the extremely pleasant and efficient staff that makes the hotel outstanding. Those at the desk, the concierge, doorman, bell hop and breakfast room staff were smiling and extremely welcoming. Taxis were obtained by the Concierge, tickets booked to attractions, eating and shopping recommendations offered. All a great success and can't recommend the hotel highly enough.
Room Tip: Ground floor rooms have small patios See more room tips
